sentences.en: Carrie followed up this desultory conversation with occasional interruptions from the Vances.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉继续这样随便地谈着,万斯夫妇偶尔也插上几句.

sentences.en: China's record of protecting its rare species has been desultory.
sentences.cn: 中国保护稀有物种的工作是不连贯的.

sentences.en: He broke into a desultory chat with me over his business affairs.
sentences.cn: 他突然开始和我漫无边际地谈起他的生意来了.

sentences.en: His conduct during these first weeks had been desultory beyond description.

sentences.en: I wandered about in a desultory fashion.

sentences.en: They talked briefly in a desultory manner.

sentences.en: Wilson and Gallagher play a desultory game of poker.
sentences.cn: 威尔逊和加拉格尔心不在焉地打着扑克.
